title: For the redevelopment/reconstruction of contravening structures situated in TP Schemes, additional F
clause_text: For the redevelopment/reconstruction of contravening structures situated in TP Schemes, additional FSI over and above permissible FSI prescribed under these Regulations shall be admissible as under:
section: 33(12).Redevelopment of contravening structures included in the Final Plot of a Town Planning (TP) Scheme and Removal and re- accommodation of tolerated structures falling in the alignment of road:
